title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Improving UX of Design Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Evaluating user experience of a design learning platform and exploring improvement strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core UX elements of a design learning platform: functionality, strategy, interface, user research, and information architecture
Learners can identify usability issues of a design learning platform in mobile environments and propose improvements
Learners can create and present a prototype for actual platform UX improvements through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
